channel.title: Experiences on weeeblog
channel.description: Recent content in Experiences on weeeblog

item.title: My first ML Conference
item.author: nikhilweee@gmail.com (Nikhil Verma)
item.description: I’m excited to attend ICML 2022! Unfortunately I’m not presenting this year (hopefully in the future), but since Baltimore is just 3 hours away from New York I thought I’d give it a shot. The student registration fees this year was $400, but I took advantage of the student volunteer programme which reimburses the registration fees if you agree to volunteer during the conference. I think it’s a great deal to save on some costs!

item.title: House hunting in New York City
item.author: nikhilweee@gmail.com (Nikhil Verma)
item.description: Finding a house in the most populated city in the US is no easy feat. Imagine doing that at a time when property prices are soaring, and it gets even worse. I had the pleasure of searching for a room in New York with an upper limit of $1500 at a time when the market was recovering back from super cheap COVID discounts. This post is a glimpse of what I learnt from my house hunting experience in the Summer of ‘22.
